title: Jimmy Carter National Historic Site: Service Animals
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility     Service Animals              Service Animals       Service Animals are permitted to be in the Visitor Center and other park facilities. Pets are welcome at the Jimmy Carter National Historic Site- but to protect other visitors, wildlife and your pets themselves, please remember these regulations:  Pets must be leashed (6' of shorter leash) at all times.   You must clean up behind your pet.   You may not leave a tethered pet unattended.   Pets may are allowed to walk the walkway at the farm but must be on a leash. They are not allowed in the Carter Home or in the Clark House.
